txt.en: Talk to Sapakár
'I would be wary in tracking Sapakár the Cleaver. The mighty Olog-hai might easily be out-smarted, though makes up for such in brute force. I know not where to find him.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Look Around</rgb> for signs of Sapakár
Sapakár stands before you on the edge of the chasm of Mordath
You should travel to the last known location of Sapakár.
Sapakár can be found deep within the bones of Barad-dûr.\n\nYou should seek out Sapakár.
Sapakár can be found somewhere in Barad-dûr.\n\nYou should confront Sapakár.
Off in the distance you spy a small group of enemies entering the ruins of Barad-dûr
<rgb=#FF0000>Look Around</rgb> for signs of Sapakár
Talk to Ingold
Ingold can be found at the Ruins of Díngarth.\n\nYou should speak with Ingold to learn anything you can about Sapakár.
This is the last known location where Ingold said he saw someone matching Sapakár's description
<rgb=#FF0000>Look Around</rgb> for signs of Sapakár at his last known location
Enter Barad-dûr and seek out Sapakár
You come across a large footprint belonging to Sapakár
Lômazar explains of Sapakár the Cleaver, a powerful ally of Dulgabêth.
'Are you here to help? We must search the pit for The Black Word.'
The Search for Sapakár
Sapakár can be found somewhere in Barad-dûr.\n\nYou should seek out Sapakár.
Seek out Sapakár
Ingold has seen a foe matching Sapakár's description

You describe Sapakár as best as you can to Ingold.\n\n'Men under my command have reported a large creature similar in description to this Sapakár that you mention. The monster was last seen near Barad-dûr. I hope this assists you on your search, my friend.'
